attr.title: Overbowed
attr.desc: Explore a kingdom overrun by evil magic as you fight foes with your own magical bow in this retro inspired action-adventure platformer.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from itch.io (https://klardonics.itch.io/overbowed) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1776840/Overbowed) and download. Extract and copy the game files to the overbowed/assets directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch.io page).
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [itch.io](https://klardonics.itch.io/overbowed) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1776840/Overbowed) and download. Extract and copy the game files to the `overbowed/assets` directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch.io page).
